definition: words do not convey the meaning/poorly expressed/senseless/inarticulate
word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]
(negative prefix)/not/no
surname Da
to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent
Italy/Italian/abbr. for 意大利[Yi4 da4 li4]
idea/meaning/thought/to think/wish/desire/intention/to expect/to anticipate

sentences.english: Said I loved you…But I lied.
sentences.chinese: 說我愛你但是詞不達意。

sentences.english: Said I love you, but I lied!
sentences.chinese: 我說過愛你，但我詞不達意。

sentences.english: Ever so often music begins when words leave off.
sentences.chinese: 經常地，言語詞不達意時，音樂繼之而起。
因爲它們是有魔力的詞不達意。
